title: Democrats seek Ukraine documents from Pence
text: Three House committees said Friday they're seeking Ukraine-related documents from Vice President Mike Pence as part of their impeachment inquiry of President Donald Trump. In a letter to Pence, the heads of the foreign affairs, intelligence and oversight panels requested the documents by Oct. 15. "Public reports have raised questions about any role you may have played in conveying or reinforcing the president's stark message to the Ukrainian president," the chairmen wrote. Trump's urging President Volodymyr Zelensky to "look into" former Vice President Joe Biden and his son is at the heart of Democrats' impeachment probe.
